column4: excuse my ignorance, but why does sudo apt-get install w32codecs return "E: Couldn't find package w32codecs" ?
because it's not in the repos. Check out the codecs on http://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
the ubotu link takes you straight to the codecs
if you add some unofficial repos you can apt-get the codecs, but you need to be cautious about that.
